Class BaseFunction

java.lang.Object

Direct Known Subclasses:
Aggregator, AllDifferent, Append, Array, BaseBinaryOperator, BaseOperator, BaseUnaryOperator, CheckAssertions, CheckSchemaElement, Constraint, Date, ForAllExists, Format, IfThenElse, Next, NSumProduct, Random, Ref, Switch, SystemComponent, TestManagedEntitiesTerminate, TestManagedEntitiesTerminate, UserInput, Vector
public abstract class BaseFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Function

Defines the base function for all the functions.

doFunction

protected abstract java.lang.Object doFunction()
                                        throws SmartFrogFunctionResolutionException
The method to implement the functionality of any function.

Returns:
the result of the function: an Object
Throws:
SmartFrogFunctionResolutionException

doit

public java.lang.Object doit(Context ctx,
                             Reference unused,
                             ReferenceResolver resolver)
                      throws SmartFrogFunctionResolutionException
base implementation of a function method. Calls the (abstract) method doFunction. Note that it makes sure that the result has no parent if it is a component description - this will cause it to be patched into whereever it is returned.

Specified by:
doit in interface Function
Parameters:
ctx - A context that contains all the parameters
unused - the reference form the root to this function instance
resolver - the ReferenceResolver (CompoenentDescription) within which the fucntion resides
Throws:
SmartFrogFunctionResolutionException - if the doFunction method does.

doit

public java.lang.Object doit(Context ctx,
                             Reference unused,
                             RemoteReferenceResolver resolver)
                      throws SmartFrogFunctionResolutionException
base implementation of a function method. Calls the (abstract) method doFunction. Note that it makes sure that the result has no parent if it is a component description - this will cause it to be patched into whereever it is returned.

Specified by:
doit in interface Function
Parameters:
ctx - A context that contains all the parameters
unused - the reference form the root to this function instance
resolver - the RemoteReferenceResolver (Prim) within which the fucntion resides
Throws:
SmartFrogFunctionResolutionException - if the doFunction method does.
